guideDescription: Need a quick setup Guide! Don't worry, this will help you!
guideEmbedDescription: Need a quick setup Guide! Don't worry, this will help you!
guideEmbedFieldsStartedValue:
{{EXCLAMATION}} Set your Birthday with {{command}}
{{ARROW_RIGHT}} Find more on [Documentation](https://docs.birthdayy.xyz/quickstart)
guideEmbedFieldsConfigValue:
{{EXCLAMATION}} Make sure to set your server configurations with {{commandEdit}} !
{{ARROW_RIGHT}} Use {{commandView}} to see your current config setting.
guideEmbedFieldsImportantValue:
{{EXCLAMATION}} My **highest** Role needs to be **above** the birthday child role.
{{ARROW_RIGHT}} Join the [Birthdayy HQ](https://invite.birthdayy.xyz) to meet the Developer and help improving Birthdayy {{CAKE}} 
{{HEART}} Like **Birthdayy**? Consider [inviting](https://join.birthdayy.xyz) and [voting](https://vote.birthdayy.xyz) for me!
{{PLUS}} Want access to beta features? [Support us on Patreon](https://donate.birthdayy.xyz)
infoDescription: Provides information about me, and links for adding the bot and joining the support server
infoEmbedDescription:
[Birthdayy Bot](https://birthdayy.xyz) {{VERSION}} is a Discord Bot designed to remember your birthday with greet uptime.
I use the [Sapphire Framework](https://sapphirejs.dev) for the [Discord.js library](https://discord.js.org).

 [Terms of use](https://birthdayy.xyz/disclosure).
pingDescription: Check the bot's latency to Discord
pingContent: Pong! Bot Latency: {{heartbeat}}ms, API Latency: {{latency, number}}ms
